scripts.test: npm run jscs && npm run eslint && npm run scsslint
scripts.start: npm run serve & npm run watch
scripts.build: npm run jade && npm run sass && npm run webpack && npm run imagemin
scripts.sass: if [[ "${NODE_ENV}" == "production" ]]; then pleeease-compile; else node-sass ./src/index.scss ./dist/assets/main.css; fi
scripts.webpack: if [[ "${NODE_ENV}" == "production" ]]; then webpack -p; else webpack; fi
scripts.watch: npm run watch:jade & npm run watch:sass & npm run watch:js
scripts.watch:jade: nodemon --ext jade --watch src/ --exec "npm run jade && browser-sync reload"
scripts.watch:sass: nodemon --ext scss --watch src/ --exec "npm run sass && browser-sync reload"
scripts.watch:js: nodemon --ext js --watch src/ --exec "npm run webpack && browser-sync reload"
